title: [1.7.2][ssp/smp]No Cubes——MC越来越真实了，看一看吓一跳
author: ghaikhg
txt_content:
MC看来真的越来越真实了，会不会以后连史蒂夫都变人类！！！！

   截图！！

  

   你们发现了什么！！！我是不会告诉你们的！！！！我那么机智，一看就发现了！

  




作者的话：
No Cubes
This mod improves Minecraft's blocky look. It smooths the natural blocks like grass and stone (so it doesn't affect buildings) and adds some random distortion to it. You must check this out!
